title: MD
biography: Lotte Bjerre Knudsen is a Danish scientist and university professor. She led the development of liraglutide and oversaw the development of semaglutide, two notable drugs approved for indications in the treatment of diabetes and obesity.
aiSummary: Lotte Bjerre Knudsen is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 59. Has been published in Science Translational Medicine, JACC Basic to Translational Science, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Unknown.
